General.Name: Zueblin Immobilien Holding AG
General.Description: Züblin Immobilien Holding AG and its subsidiaries (together the Züblin Group) are focused on the management of the Group's real estate portfolio. As of 30 September 2022 Züblin Group operates exclusively in Switzerland and has employed six persons (31 March 2022: six persons). Züblin Immobilien Holding AG is a Swiss stock corporation domiciled at Hardturmstrasse 76, Zurich, Switzerland, and is the parent company of the Züblin Group. The Company's shares are traded on the main segment of SIX Swiss Exchange.
